EmailTemplate.subject: 2nd Half Compensation Update: PCF Bonus & SPIF Renewals
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Pivotal Cloud Foundry SPIF PCF is an exciting product for Pivotal. It is clear that the market timing is good and customers are receptive. It is time to drive footprint! With that said, we are pleased to introduce more opportunities for bonus income above and beyond your target compensation.
From July 1st through December 31st all Reps and FE individual contributors are eligible to both receive $7,500 USD on each new 1, 2 or 3 year PCF Subscription customer booking >$250K per unique customer order. The SPIF will be paid after the fiscal year close. Only (1) Rep and (1) FE are eligible for the SPIF per customer order.
PS@E and DCA SPIF have been renewed for 2H FY14. The same requirements will continue for the remainder of the year. Please reference the Pivotal Compensation Deck <https://drive.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/file/d/0B7uO4XIa64ANR2JoYjFPaktsb1k/edit?usp=sharing> on Inside Pivotal for further detail.
To review all compensation plans; please visit Pivotalâ€™s Ts & Cs and Compensation Overview Deck, located here.

Greg Stroud
